title: Keyboard shortcut toggle behavior
details:
## Keyboard Shortcut Toggle Implementation (v1.6.4.1)

### Alt+Shift+S - Open to Settings Tab
- `_execute_sidebar_action` command is handled by `_handleOpenToSettingsTab()`
- Opens sidebar if closed, then switches to Settings tab
- Uses `_sendSettingsTabMessage()` with retry logic

### Ctrl+Alt+Z - Toggle Manager Tab  
- `toggle-quick-tabs-manager` command is handled by `_handleToggleQuickTabsManager()`
- Uses `browser.sidebarAction.isOpen({})` to check if sidebar is open
- If Manager is showing: closes sidebar with `browser.sidebarAction.close()`
- If Settings is showing: switches to Manager tab
- If sidebar is closed: opens and switches to Manager

### Message Types
- `SWITCH_TO_SETTINGS_TAB` - Switch sidebar to Settings tab
- `SWITCH_TO_MANAGER_TAB` - Switch sidebar to Manager tab
- `GET_CURRENT_PRIMARY_TAB` - Query current tab state (returns { primaryTab: 'settings' | 'manager' })

### Key APIs Used
- `browser.sidebarAction.isOpen({})` - Returns Promise<boolean>
- `browser.sidebarAction.open()` - Opens sidebar
- `browser.sidebarAction.close()` - Closes sidebar
- `browser.runtime.sendMessage()` - Bidirectional messaging with sidebar

### Files Modified
- `background.js` - Command handlers and helper functions
- `sidebar/settings.js` - Message listeners in `initializeTabSwitching()`
